sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { public nombre_usuario = localStorage.getItem('nombre_usuario'); public apellido1 = localStorage.getItem('apellido1'); public apellido2 = localStorage.getItem('apellido2'); }
